EmailTemplate.name: Co-Branding Request Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: One of our Channel Partners have submitted a Co-branded project request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Channel Programs,
{!Co_Branding_Request__c.OwnerFullName} with {!Co_Branding_Request__c.Account__c} submitted a co-branding request {!Co_Branding_Request__c.Name} in Partner Network Resource Center.
Please review this request and inform the partner of its disposition and status.
Sincerely,
NCR Partner Network
